abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32451846, pmid32451823, pmid32451736, pmid32449851, pmid32451533, pmid32451626, pmid32451936, pmid32449099, pmid32449903, pmid32452036, pmid32451563, pmid32449782, pmid32458969, pmid32449575, pmid32452050, pmid32449235, pmid32449169, pmid32458230, pmid32451655, pmid32449781, pmid32448085, pmid32459359, pmid32449297, pmid32450727, pmid32450732, pmid32451359, pmid32451325, pmid32458197, pmid32450750, pmid32456658, pmid32449178, pmid32458565, pmid32451657, pmid32456713, pmid32451808, pmid32451362, pmid32456735, pmid32454003, pmid32450607, pmid32450787, pmid32451877, pmid32450934, pmid32451971, pmid32450752, pmid32450927, pmid32449328, pmid32451923, pmid32449802, pmid32448041
